title: How to Unsync and Delete Uploaded Contacts From Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This feature can only be disabled using the mobile app. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This will be at the top-right (Android) or bottom-right (iOS).

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this in the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap Accounts Center . This is the tile at the top.

steps.title: Tap Your information and permissions.
steps.content: Tap Your information and permissions . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Upload contacts and select your account.
steps.content: Tap Upload contacts and select your account. If you have multiple Facebook accounts linked, you'll see them here.

steps.title: Toggle off "Upload contacts".
steps.content: Toggle off "Upload contacts". The switch will turn grey. Once this feature is disabled, you can delete your uploaded contacts using the app or website . If needed, you can also remove your phone number from your Facebook account.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This will be at the top-right (Android) or bottom-right (iOS). Keep in mind that un-syncing contacts from Facebook will not remove any friends from your Facebook friends list. You'll need to unfriend them to remove them.

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this in the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap Accounts Center . This is the tile at the top.

steps.title: Tap Your information and permissions.
steps.content: Tap Your information and permissions . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Upload contacts and select your account.
steps.content: Tap Upload contacts and select your account. If you have multiple Facebook accounts linked, you'll see them here.

steps.title: Tap Learn More.
steps.content: Tap Learn More . This is underneath the Upload contacts option.

steps.title: Tap manage or delete link.
steps.content: Tap manage or delete link . You may need to scroll down to find this option.

steps.title: Tap Delete all.
steps.content: Tap Delete all . All previously synced contacts will be deleted from Facebook.

steps.title: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook.
steps.content: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook. A menu will expand. If you're not already signed in to Facebook , you'll need to do so first.

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . It's near the top of the menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . It's at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Click Accounts Center.
steps.content: Click Accounts Center . You'll see this option in the left panel.

steps.title: Click Your information and permissions.
steps.content: Click Your information and permissions . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Upload contacts and select your account.
steps.content: Tap Upload contacts and select your account. If you have multiple Facebook accounts linked, you'll see them here.

steps.title: Click Learn More.
steps.content: Click Learn More . This is underneath the Upload contacts option.

steps.title: Click manage or delete link.
steps.content: Click manage or delete link . You may need to scroll down to find this option.

steps.title: Click Delete all.
steps.content: Click Delete all . All previously synced contacts will be deleted from Facebook.

steps.title: Restart the Facebook app.
steps.content: Restart the Facebook app. If you can't delete your contacts using the methods above, you may need to restart the app to fix minor software bugs. Close the app completely, and then try deleting contacts again.

steps.title: Log out and log back in again.
steps.content: Log out and log back in again. A simple relog can fix errors with your account. Log out by tapping your profile picture and selecting Log out . Then, sign into your Facebook account again.

steps.title: Contact Facebook.
steps.content: Contact Facebook. If you still can't get your contacts to unsync from your Facebook account, you'll need to contact Facebook to remove it since this is likely a bug on their end. You can contact Facebook directly on the website or app by selecting the menu > Help & support > Report a problem.
